Browse new deals, add your own codes and find referrals from friends, all with the click of a button.

Never miss a deal

Install the Pollyn Chrome extension and it will notify when there is a referral available for the the site that you are on.

Friends come first

Sign up in the extension and add your friends to see referrals from them first (They'll thank you later).

Add your own codes

Choose to share your referrals with the larger community or just your friends. We'll let you know when someone uses your referral so that you can celebrate earning those sweet bonuses.

Everywhere you need it

Whether you're using the website, mobile app, or Chrome extension, Pollyn can help you find and share referrals for your favorite brands.
